EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Offer: Take your IT learning to the next level
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Brian,
As a way of saying thank you for being a loyal customer of Turbonomic, we are excited to offer an opportunity to take your IT learning to the next level through a one-year Pluralsight <[[https://www.pluralsight.com/]]> membership. You’re already an IT leader adopting revolutionary technology, and we want to support you as you continue to work on new skills through this incredibly popular learning environment.
If you aren’t already familiar, Pluralsight is widely regarded as the technology learning platform enterprises depend on to help teams and learners gain the skills they need to create better products and take control of their careers.
Please let me know directly if you are interested in this membership and we will get you set up – our gift to you.
Thank you again, and we look forward to continuing our work with you!
Best, Steve Corndell
